DataElement.preferredName: Medical History Myocardial Infarction Previous Year Before Trial Registration Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a patient has a history of myocardial infarction (MI) one year prior to clinical trial registration.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical History Myocardial Infarction Previous Year Before Trial Registration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.._Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area, as in coronary thrombosis._Earlier in time or order. (NCI)_The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area, as in coronary thrombosis.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.
Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area, as in coronary thrombosis.

Property.preferredName: Previous Year Prior Clinical Trial Registration
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:Earlier in time or order.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: One Year MI History Prior to
ReferenceDocuments.description: One Year MI History Prior to Registration

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI CCR study of brain cancer BTTC11, a study being run also at MD Anderson, so the lists of values and semantics are created exactly to support that trial. 11.13.2015. dmr.
